start.speaker: Censor
start.text:
The Authority calls this a hearing.
You should call it what it is: a knife that asks politely.

You have carried your signatures here. Now choose what to do with them.

choices.text: Reduce Censure: accept the ritual, pay the fine, and live smaller.
Defy Censure: refuse the ritual, keep your name, and live hunted.

vow.speaker: Censor
vow.text:
So be it.

The Ladder does not forgive. It only recalculates.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text:
The contract closes with a sound like a book shutting in an empty room.

You can walk away, but you cannot walk back into who you were.
